📈 LEVEL UP YOUR TWITTER GROWTH
X.Gamified transforms your Twitter growth journey into an engaging experience. Build your audience systematically with gamified daily routines and progress tracking.

🎯 KEY FEATURES:

- Daily Routines Split Into Morning, Afternoon & Evening
- XP-based Progress System
- Club Membership Levels (Starter → Diamond)
- Streak Tracking
- Real-time Progress Monitoring

💪 WHAT YOU GET:

- Structured posting and engagement targets
- Clear XP rewards for each action
- Daily progress tracking toward your goal
- Club progression system to keep you motivated
- Calendar view to track your consistency

🏆 CLUB PROGRESSION:
Start your journey as a Starter Club member and progress through Bronze, Silver, and Gold levels as you consistently engage and grow your audience.

🎮 WHY X.GAMIFIED?

- Makes Twitter growth systematic and fun
- Keeps you accountable with daily targets
- Provides clear metrics for success
- Helps maintain posting consistency
- Track your growth journey effortlessly

Perfect for:

- Content Creators
- Indie Hackers
- Entrepreneurs
- Community Builders
- Anyone looking to grow their Twitter presence

Get started today and transform your Twitter growth into an engaging game!
